Issue.creator: mastersingh24
Issue.summary: Add support for alternative mechanisms for locating pkcs11 keys
Issue.description: The pkcs11 implementation in Fabric currently generates a key via pkcs11, then creates a X509 certificate with an SKI and then updates the CKA_ID attribute of the key via pkcs11.Â The problem is that this assumes that the CKA_ID attribute is always writable and this is not always the case (e.g. AWS CloudHSM).
